document.full_text: "the boondock saints" director troy duffy was in austin this week to connect with his fans at sxsw. after releasing two movies theatrically, the next step for the franchise would be to enter the video game space.
document.title: "boondock saints" director exploring video game
lines_and_colors: "the boondock saints" director troy duffy was in austin this week to connect with his fans at sxsw. after releasing two movies theatrically, the next step for the franchise would be to enter the video game space.
